reviews.author: Nimal P.
reviews.title: Excellent rooftop views and great location
reviews.comment: Clean rooms, solid breakfast, and the rooftop pool had a great sunset view. Check-in was smooth.

reviews.author: Samantha J.
reviews.title: Classic Colombo experience
reviews.comment: Heritage charm, oceanfront vibes, and a memorable evening at the terrace. Rooms were comfortable and staff were attentive.
